author: mrglavas
msg: Fixing a bug. In the loop handling a CDATA section we should be
comparing the current position against the end offset, not the length.

author: mrglavas
msg: When start >= length a fatal error was emitted for surrogate characters.

doesn't necessarily start from zero this comparison isn't valid. Should be
